meanings.definition: To make known or state clearly
meanings.sent1: She declares her love for him every day.
meanings.sent2: The president declares a national holiday.
meanings.sent3: The cat declares its hunger by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The colorful sunset declares the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher declares the winner of the spelling bee with a smile.

meanings.sent1: The judge declares the verdict in the courtroom.
meanings.sent2: The mayor declares the new library open to the public.
meanings.sent3: The clown declares his arrival with a loud horn.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm declares its power with booming thunder.
meanings.sent5: The referee declares the match a tie after a close game.

meanings.sent1: The test results declare her intelligence.
meanings.sent2: The evidence declares his innocence in the case.
meanings.sent3: The magician declares the rabbit out of the hat.
meanings.sent4: The blooming flowers declare the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent5: The detective declares the suspect's guilt with solid proof.
